## HOW TO INSTALL

```
poetry add merkly
```

```
pip install merkly
```

## HOW IT WORKS

This library provides a clean and easy to use implementation of the Merkle Tree with the following features:

- [x] Create Leaf
- [ ] Create Root
- [ ] Create Proof
- [ ] Validate Leafs
